page.syntax: [% [ Z ] S Minimum, Maximum [, Increment ] %. Width Spin ]

argument.name: Z
argument.description: Character. Suppresses the display of zero entries.

argument.name: Minimum
argument.description: Numeric. The minimum value that can be set.

argument.name: Maximum
argument.description: Numeric. The maximum value that can be set

argument.name: Increment
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. Default = 1. The amount that the number displayed changes by.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Spin
argument.description: Numeric. The numeric variable that contains the current value of the control.

page.description: The Spin Control increments or decrements a counter. One or more Spin controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function. The developer should initialize the Spin variable to a value between Minimum and Maximum.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.
